en: Peppa and George have come to Granny and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch.
zh: 佩奇和乔治来到猪奶奶和猪爷爷家吃午餐。

en: Would you like to pick some vegetables from the garden for lunch?
zh: 你们想从花园里摘些蔬菜做午餐吗？

en: This is Grandpa Pig's vegetable garden.
He has grown all these vegetables himself!
zh: 这些蔬菜全是他自己种的！

en: Let's choose some vegetables for lunch.
zh: 我们选些蔬菜做午餐吧。

en: Oh, dear. Do you both like lettuce?
zh: 哦，天啊。你们俩喜欢吃生菜吗？

en: Oh, dear! I must have something that George likes.
zh: 哦，天啊！我一定有乔治喜欢吃的。

en: and he does not like lettuce,
and he does not like tomatoes.
Well, George, what vegetable do you like?
zh: 好吧，乔治，你喜欢吃什么蔬菜？

en: Silly George! Chocolate cake isn't a vegetable!
zh: 傻乔治！巧克力蛋糕可不是蔬菜！

en: Maybe George will like the vegetables when they're made into a lovely salad.
zh: 也许乔治会喜欢吃蔬菜只要把它们做成可口的沙拉。

en: Ooh! Lovely fresh tomatoes,lettuce and cucumber!
zh: 哦！新鲜可口的番茄，生菜和黄瓜！

en: First, we have to wash them!
zh: 首先，我们必需要洗一下它们！

en: Peppa and George help Granny Pig wash the vegetables.
zh: 佩奇和乔治帮奶奶清洗蔬菜。

en: Granny Pig has made the tomatoes, lettuce and cucumber into a salad.
zh: 猪奶奶把番茄，生菜和黄瓜制成沙拉。

en: Grandpa Pig, can you call everyone to lunch?
zh: 猪爷爷，你可以叫大家来吃午饭吗？

en: Granny Pig has made pizza for lunch.
made with Grandpa's tomatoes, lettuce and cucumber!
zh: 是用爷爷的番茄，生菜和黄瓜做的！

en: But George does not like the tomatoes or the lettuce or the cucumber.
zh: 但乔治不喜欢吃番茄，生菜和黄瓜。

en: George, just try a little bit of this lovely tomato.
zh: 乔治，尝一点这可口的番茄吧。

en: Grandpa Pig grew it in his garden!
zh: 猪爷爷自己在花园种的！

en: Try a piece of lettuce, George. It's yummy!
zh: 尝一片生菜吧，乔治。很好吃的！

en: George is eating the tomatoes, lettuce and cucumber!
zh: 乔治开始吃番茄，生菜和黄瓜了。

en: Would you like some more, George?
George, are you too full to eat any more tomatoes,lettuce or cucumber?
zh: 乔治，你是不是吃得太饱了，一点番茄，生菜和黄瓜都不能吃了？

en: George is too full to eat any more.
zh: 乔治吃得太饱了不能再吃别的东西了。

en: George, are you too full to eat anything more?
zh: 乔治，你是不是吃得太饱，别的都吃不下了？

en: George is too full to eat anything more.
zh: 乔治吃得太饱，别的都吃不下了。

en: Oh, well, then you won't want any of this chocolate cake!
zh: 哦，好的，那么你也应该吃不下巧克力蛋糕了！

en: George seems to have got his appetite back!
zh: 看来乔治的胃口又回来了！
